attributes.title: Lost Gavin's Way With Words
attributes.description: In RTAA #173, we have a compilation of some of Gavin's weird phrasing when trying to pose academic questions and statements.

attributes.title: Gavin Drinks Fart Coffee
attributes.description: In RTAA #174, Gavin leaves his cup of coffee in the Achievement Hunter office, and Geoff adds some flavor to it without him knowing.

attributes.title: The Pubert Situation
attributes.description: In RTAA #175, the Achievement Hunter gang discusses whether a fungus can get an achievement, and debate just who is Pubert Addams.

attributes.title: Oven Peeing, Shirt in the Wild
attributes.description: In RTAA #176, Chris tells a tale of the time he accidentally peed in an oven, and Gavin surprises a fan wearing a Rooster Teeth shirt out in the wild.
attributes.display_title: 2015:E4 - Oven Peeing, Shirt in the Wild

attributes.title: Barbara's Bad Text
attributes.description: In RTAA #177, Barbara sends a text that sends Burnie into search-and-rescue mode.

attributes.title: Helium Miners & Bacon Meals
attributes.description: In RTAA #178, the guys talk about how hard it is to get a hold of helium, and Barbara is unimpressed by a local restaurant.

attributes.title: Matt Meets Lois Lane
attributes.description: In RTAA #179, Matt talks about the first time they were at Comic Con, and how they upstaged the cast of Superman 2.

attributes.title: Robot Cars Solve Everything
attributes.description: In RTAA #180, Chris makes his case for how self-driving cars will solve everything wrong with traffic and commuting.

attributes.title: Barbara Pun-kelman III
attributes.caption: RTAA #181
attributes.description: Yes, Barbara has now made enough puns to make three Animated Adventures about it. She's probably the only one happy about it.

attributes.title: Poopy Pants Miles
attributes.caption: RTAA #182
attributes.description: Miles gets sick in London, which leads to an unfortunate incident involving his pants. You'll never guess what.

attributes.title: Burnie Gets Busted
attributes.caption: RTAA #183
attributes.description: Technology betrays Burnie when it rats him out after he watches some adult-themed media.

attributes.title: Benjamin's Secret Bar
attributes.caption: RTAA #184
attributes.description: Gus has a dream where he follows his dog Benjamin into a bar, where he performs an act forbidden in the Sorola household.

attributes.title: Burnie's Burger Dream
attributes.caption: RTAA #185
attributes.description: No matter where he goes or what he dreams, Burnie cannot escape the burger he ate for dinner.

attributes.title: Godzilla vs. The Girls School of Mystery
attributes.caption: RTAA #186
attributes.description: Jack and Joel pitch a blockbuster movie about Godzilla solving a murder at an all girls school, but they can't seem to agree on the tone for the film.
attributes.display_title: 2015:E14 - Godzilla vs. The Girls School of Mystery

attributes.title: Lindsay The Poke-Bully
attributes.caption: RTAA #187
attributes.description: Lindsay tells about how she used to bully church kids to get Pokemon cards, and Matt has to battle to earn his place in the afterlife.

attributes.title: The Burglar and The Fire
attributes.caption: RTAA #188
attributes.description: Chris, Gus, and Gav talk about what they'd do if they were robbing a house that's on fire.

attributes.title: The Legend of Drunk Matt
attributes.caption: RTAA #189
attributes.description: Gus and Geoff remember their favorites Drunk Matt moments. Audio from RT Sponsorcast - Parties

attributes.title: Barbara Pun-kelman IV
attributes.caption: RTAA #190
attributes.description: Hope you like puns, because it's time for another installment of Barbara Pun-kelman! This time, Burnie gets in on the action, and Barbara tell a pun so bad Gus and Burnie take the easy way out.

attributes.title: The Boobs That Got Away
attributes.caption: RTAA #191
attributes.description: Gus' story about Drunk Matt lost on/at the Subway brings up a painful memory of loss from Geoff's past.Audio from RT Sponsorcast - Parties

attributes.title: Joel & Matt Take a Spill
attributes.caption: RTAA #192
attributes.description: More drunk stories! This time, Matt gets thrown out of a blackjack table for spilling all the drinks, and Joel also laments being "that guy" when he does it, too.

attributes.title: Crashes & Cleptos
attributes.caption: RTAA #193
attributes.description: Burnie wonders what constitutes a crash for an aircraft, and Gus tells a story about a naughty club he was in with Geoff.

attributes.title: AH ASMR FTW
attributes.caption: RTAA #194
attributes.description: Michael, Gavin, and Ryan the Naughty Chef try to make an ASMR video.

attributes.title: Geoff Gets Cut Off
attributes.caption: RTAA #195
attributes.description: Geoff gets drunk at a party without realizing, and freaks out that he might have embarrassed himself.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast

attributes.title: Burnie & The Name Game
attributes.caption: RTAA #196
attributes.description: Burnie gets confused when someone with a similar name to his gets called up at the airport lounge.

attributes.title: RTAAYEAYEA - RTX Intro 2015
attributes.caption: This year's RTAA panel intro for RTX is a mix of classic and new videos with an RTAA twist.
attributes.description: This year's RTAA panel intro for RTX is a mix of classic and new videos with an RTAA twist.

attributes.title: Gettin' Busey With It
attributes.caption: Geoff and Michael have a cool celebrity run-in with Gary Busey! Until they realize he's a crazy person.
attributes.description: Geoff and Michael have a cool celebrity run-in with Gary Busey! Until they realize he's a crazy person.Audio from Let's Play GTA V: Pacific Standard Job Part 3

attributes.title: The Robo-Telemarketer
attributes.caption: Burnie gets a call and is uncertain whether he is talking to an annoying robot or an annoying telemarketer.
attributes.description: Burnie gets a call and is uncertain whether he is talking to an annoying robot or an annoying telemarketer.

attributes.title: Burnie & Ashley Search for Food
attributes.caption: While in France, Burnie desperately searches for food before Ashley becomes hangry. But it's impossible to find food during certain times of the day.
attributes.description: While in France, Burnie desperately searches for food before Ashley becomes hangry. But it's impossible to find food during certain times of the day. Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast Post Show

attributes.title: That's My Uncle!
attributes.caption: ​In the 200th episode special, join us on a magical adventure from a forgotten anime. That's My Uncle follows the adventures of Burnie-san and his fellow Battle Fighter classmates as they try to collect all the Challenge Crystals before the forces of evil
attributes.description: In the 200th episode special, join us on a magical adventure from a forgotten anime. That's My Uncle follows the adventures of Burnie-san and his fellow Battle Fighter classmates as they try to collect all the Challenge Crystals before the forces of evil. I think Thanks to Crunchyroll for sponsoring this episode of RTAA!

attributes.title: The Machinima Death Switch
attributes.caption: Burnie discovers the existence of a very inconvenient switch which shuts down the machinima station at the office.​
attributes.description: New RTAA poster!Burnie discovers the existence of a very inconvenient switch which shuts down the machinima station at the office.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #330Like the animated adventure

attributes.title: Gavin the Perfect Passenger
attributes.caption: Gavin talks about airplane passengers who inconvenienced him.
attributes.description: Gavin talks about airplane passengers who inconvenienced him.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #327Become a Sponsor here:

attributes.title: That's My Uncle! Outtakes
attributes.caption: Some outtakes from RTAA #200. Watch as the cast try to channel their inner otaku.
attributes.description: Some outtakes from RTAA #200. Watch as the cast try to channel their inner otaku.

attributes.title: Barbara is Family Friendly
attributes.caption: Barbara becomes too acclimated to the Australia lifestyle and has a slip-up during a panel.
attributes.description: Barbara becomes too acclimated to the Australia lifestyle and has a slip-up during a panel.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #321

attributes.title: The Contractor Conundrum
attributes.caption: Burnie and Gus talk about their not-so-awesome experiences working with contractors.
attributes.description: Burnie and Gus talk about their not-so-awesome experiences working with contractors.Audio from The Rooster Teeth Podcast #330

attributes.title: Forgetful Thanks, Black Hallway
attributes.caption: Geoff forgets how to express his gratitude. Burnie talks about how Geoff once painted his hallway black.
attributes.description: Geoff forgets how to express his gratitude. Burnie talks about how Geoff once painted his hallway black.Audio from Let's Watch: Until Dawn Part 7 and The Rooster Teeth Podcast #346

attributes.title: Cat Stories
attributes.caption: Gavin and Burnie talk about the annoying things their cats do. Gus talks about a cat who returned home after years in the wild.
attributes.description: Gavin and Burnie talk about the annoying things their cats do. Gus talks about a cat who returned home after years in the wild.  Audio from RT Podcast #341 and RT Podcast #349

attributes.title: Apple Pay-n in the Butt
attributes.caption: Burnie tries to impress Gavin and Dan with his fancy ApplePay phone, but it's less amazing than he thinks.
attributes.description: Burnie tries to impress Gavin and Dan with his fancy ApplePay phone, but it's less amazing than he thinks.Audio from RT Podcast #323

attributes.title: Biscuits or Breadsticks
attributes.caption: Miles, Kerry, and Michael have an age-old debate of what's better: Red Lobster Cheddar Bay Biscuits, or Olive Garden Breadsticks. Who will emerge victorious? I don't know, but I'm sure the comments section will be a mess.
attributes.description: Miles, Kerry, and Michael have an age-old debate of what's better: Red Lobster Cheddar Bay Biscuits, or Olive Garden Breadsticks. Who will emerge victorious I don't know, but I'm sure the comments section will be a mess.  Audio from RT Podcast #348

attributes.title: Geoff's Failed Sex Dream
attributes.caption: Geoff has a sex dream for the first time, but it doesn't go as well as he would hope.
attributes.description: Geoff has a sex dream for the first time, but it doesn't go as well as he would hope.Audio from Let's Play Minecraft #158

attributes.title: Haircut Mishaps
attributes.caption: Gus, Gavin, and Chris relive some awkward moments they've had while getting a haircut.
attributes.description: Gus, Gavin, and Chris relive some awkward moments they've had while getting a haircut.Audio from RT Podcast #314
